column6: Moira MacTaggert has paid dearly over the years for her allegiance to the X-Men, but will this latest altercation ask her to pay the ultimate price? AND, a familiar face is back to cause the X-Men trouble. But you've never seen him like this before! FROM COMICS LEGEND CHRIS CLAREMONT AND ART BY RODNEY BUCHEMI (INCREDIBLE HERCULES)! GREAT JUMPING ON POINT WITH ISSUE 6! Rated A ...$3.99 (each)
column8: | inker:Greg Adams | penciller:Mike Grell | penciller:Tom Grummett | letterer:Tom Orzechowski | colorist:Wil Quintana | other:Marc Sumerak
